member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.RealSense.Windows.RealSenseSensor
member.summary: Component that captures and streams video and depth from an Intel RealSense camera.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.RealSense.Windows.RealSenseSensor.#ctor(Microsoft.Psi.Pipeline)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The pipeline to add the component to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.RealSense.Windows.RealSenseSensor.ColorImage
member.summary: Gets the emitter that generates RGB images from the RealSense depth camera.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.RealSense.Windows.RealSenseSensor.DepthImage
member.summary: Gets the emitter that generates Depth images from the RealSense depth camera.
